pages.text: The $(l:resources/stratine)Stratine Gem$() you set into this circlet, itself a creation of the Nether, can absorb high temperatures with ease.$(br)It even protects you from the blazing heat of Lava - if only for a short time.$(br)Pair it with $(thing)Fire Resistance$(), you're able to swim in Lava almost as if it were Water.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: $(li)Prevents all damage from fires and hot floors$(li)Considerable boost in both mobility and vision when submerged in lava$(li)When triggered, grants you a brief shield against extreme heat
